li.A minor in Community Arts-PAVE is offere: A minor in Community Arts-PAVE is offered for the student who is majoring in Art, Music, Theatre, or English (with a Creative Writing focus). Students interested in the minor should contact the School director.

h3.Partners in Art in Visual Education (PAV: Partners in Art in Visual Education (PAVE)

courseSection0.text:
Partners in Art in Visual Education (PAVE)
A minor in Community Arts-PAVE is offered for the student who is majoring in Art, Music, Theatre, or English (with a Creative Writing focus). Students interested in the minor should contact the School director.
    Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

body.text:
Other Requirements
Complete all of the following
A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) in lower level courses are not accepted.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the School of Visual Arts and Design.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used toward the minor.
